member.name: M:PlannetServer.Api.Controllers.OrdersController.Put(System.Guid,PlannetServer.Application.Commands.UpdateOrder)
member.summary: Updates the details of a specific order.
member.response: The HTTP `204 [No Content]` response code indicates that the server successfully processed the request and is not returning any content.
The HTTP `400 [Bad Request]` response code indicates that the server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error.
The HTTP `404 [Not Found]` response code indicates that the server can not find the requested resource.

member.name: M:PlannetServer.Api.Controllers.PostsController.Get(PlannetServer.Application.Queries.Posts.GetPostQuery)
member.response: Returns a list containing all orders.
The HTTP `400 [Bad Request]` response code indicates that the server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error.
The HTTP `404 [Not Found]` response code indicates that the server can not find the requested resource.
